phrase.name: Zlatan Ibrahimovic
phrase.saying: I don’t believe in luck, I only believe in hard work

phrase.name: David Beckham
phrase.saying: The reason I success is because I’ve never been afraid to fail

phrase.name: George Best
phrase.saying: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do

phrase.name: Pelé
phrase.saying: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning

phrase.name: Lionel Messi
phrase.saying: The only victory that counts is the one over yourself

phrase.name: Zinedine Zidane
phrase.saying: If you want to see the best, you have to do the best

phrase.name: Jose Mourinho
phrase.saying: The most important quality a player can have is not skill, but mentality

phrase.name: Ryan Giggs
phrase.saying: You can always improve, you can always get better

phrase.name: Rio Ferdinand
phrase.saying: Confidence is a massive part of success in football. If you believe in yourself and your team, you can achieve anything
